# Version: 5

# Make sure AUTOUIC knows where to find the .ui files.
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC_SEARCH_PATHS "./include/ui/ui_files/")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "${CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS} /SUBSYSTEM:CONSOLE")
